sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app>
        <v-main>
            <v-container>
<v-col>{{ message }}</v-col>
                <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="6">メンバー管理</v-col>
                    <v-col cols="7">
                        <v-btn color="primary" dark class="mb-2" v-bind="attrs" v-on="on">
                            新規作成
                        </v-btn>
                    </v-col>
                </v-row>
                        <v-row>
                            <v-col>
                                <v-data-table :headers="headers" :items="users">
                                    <template v-slot:[`item.delete`]="{ index }">
                                        <v-btn @click="del(users[index].id)">
                                            delete
                                        </v-btn>
                                        <v-btn
                                            @click="update(users[index].id, users[index].userName, users[index].slackId)">
                                            update
                                        </v-btn>
                                    </template>
                                </v-data-table>
                            </v-col>
                        </v-row>
                        <v-container>
                            <v-row justify="right" class="align-center">
                                <v-btn @click="insert()">
                                    Insert
                                </v-btn>
                            </v-row>
                        </v-container>
            </v-container>
        </v-main>
    </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'
export default {
    beforeRouteUpdate(to, from, next) {
        this.message = to.params.message;

        this.selectAll()
        next()
    },
    data() {
        return {
            message: this.$route.params.message,
            users: [],
            headers: [
                {
                    text: 'ユーザ名',
                    value: 'userName',
                },
                {
                    text: 'SlackID',
                    value: 'slackId',
                },
                {
                    text: '操作',
                    value: 'delete',
                    align: 'center',
                    sortable: false,
                },
            ],
        }
    },
    created() {
        this.selectAll()
    },
    methods: {
        selectAll() {
            const path = 'http://localhost:8080/user/selectUserAll';
            axios.get(path)
                .then(response => {
                    this.users = response.data
                })
                .catch(error => {
                    console.log(error)
                })
        },
        insert() {
            this.$router.push(
                "MemberInsert"
            );
        },
        del(id) {
            confirm("削除してもよろしいですか？");
            const path = 'http://localhost:8080/user/deleteUser?id=' + id
            axios.delete(path
            )
                .then(response => {
                    console.log(response.data);
                    this.$router.go({
                        name: "MemberManagement",
                        params: {
                            message: "DeleteComplete!!"
                        }
                    });
                })
                .catch(err => {
                    console.log("err:", err);
                });
        },
        update(id, userName, slackId) {
            this.$router.push({
                name: "MemberUpdate",
                params: {
                    id: id,
                    userName: userName,
                    slackId: slackId,
                }
            });
        },
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped></style>
